name: 3 Households
description:
This project is a simulation of a fractal family unit or a revolving home structure between mom, daughter, and daughter’s girlfriend. In this game, Days and Nights manifest as a color yellow, which is born out of their 49 days of cohabitation after the funeral. You are here to look after a new pattern with 21 boxes made of quotes on trauma transforming techniques. Let the record desensitized and reprocessed.

How to Play

There are 4 types of buttons to click.
  • Time on TOP | Move to the next scene when it's unlocked.
  • Puzzle on MIDDLE | Reorganize the boxes on your own SYMMETRICAL SYMBOLS.
  • Guide on LEFT and RIGHT | Words must be reorganized by your play and belief.
  • Cinema Mode by RIGHT-CLICK anywhere | You can have a whole view without UI buttons. Left-click anywhere to come back.

Press F12 to collect a screenshot while playing or press esc to quit the game.

Running Time

Between 3 and 21 minutes. It can also take forever as this game is fundamentally an endless alarm clock or symbol maker.

Recommended Aspect Ratio

32:9 DUHD, DQHD / 16:10 WQXGA / 16:9 5K, 4K, FHD


{“The Mind of a Destructive Mother”, “The Quantum Wave Field of a Productive Daughter”, “The Physical Constitution of the Daughter’s Potential Girlfriend” };
